greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of solution to zeta(x) = 2.
reference: Steven R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge University Press, 2003, Section 5.5 Kalmar's Composition Constant, p. 293.
link: Hsien-Kuei Hwang, Distribution of the number of factors in random ordered factorizations of integers, Journal of Number Theory 81:1 (2000), pp. 61-92.
M. Klazar and F. Luca, On the maximal order of numbers in the "factorisatio numerorum" problem, arXiv:math/0505352 [math.NT], 2005-2006.
mathematica: x /. FindRoot[ Zeta[x] == 2, {x, 2}, WorkingPrecision -> 102] // RealDigits // First (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 19 2013 *)
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, May 20 2005
